name: Animal The Card Match Game
description:
Animal card match game is the classic board game, which help develop memory skills of children. Playing this animal card match game with your kids will help them improve their recognition while having fun.

This game is not only capable of being challenging enough for adults but also as easy as for kids and toddlers to play. Animal card match game contains very cute images of animals, birds, sea animals as lion, cat, dog, crow, parrot, octopus, fish etc., which are on memory cards.

Match Up will allow you to challenge your memory. Animal card match game has very easy 2x2, 2x3 by tables which your kids will love but also 2x4, 3x4, 3x6, 6x6, 5x6 and 6x6 tables which can be very challenging.

The object is to match pairs of cards in as little moves as possible. When cards are turned over, it is important to remember where they are for when the matching card is turned up later in the game.

Features of Animal card match game:

⁃ Cute animals, birds, sea animals
⁃ Colorful graphics
⁃ Flip the cards
⁃ Match the pairs
⁃ Different difficulty levels
⁃ Easy and simple to gameplay
⁃ Develops recognition, concentration and motor skills of kid
⁃ Visual memory training
⁃ It helps kids to recognize different animals

Feel free to request improvements and changes!

With Animal card match game Exercise your Memory !
